name: Patheos: Dark
description: A dark theme for http://www.patheos.com blogs.
additional_info:
Name:    Patheos: Dark
Author:  cr0sh
Version: v0.0.1

This is my first userstyles.org theme. I originally created it for getting a dark page on Friendly Atheist. I have no idea if it works for other Patheos sites - but it probably will (mostly?). Suggestions or fixes, send 'em my way. Thanks, and enjoy!
